title: rl/hifivariantcaller pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

tx_bam.errorMessage: FastQ or bam file for the treatment/tumor reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz', '.fastq.gz', or '.bam'

ctl_bam.errorMessage: FastQ or bam file for the control/normal reads may optionally be provided (must be provided if run in tumor/normal mode), cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz', '.fastq.gz', or '.bam'

ind_fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for the assembly of the individual must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa' or '.fasta'

ref_fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for the reference genome to use as a source of annotations must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa' or '.fasta'

chain.errorMessage: Chain file for lifting over the individual genome coordinates to reference genome coordinates for annotaiton must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.chain'
